mapper.sql: id, title, create_by, create_date, remote_addr, request_uri, remarks, exception
mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (id, title, create_by, create_date, remote_addr, request_uri, remarks, exception) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_log
id,
title,
create_by,
create_date,
remote_addr,
request_uri,
remarks,
exception,

mapper.update:
update sys_log
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remote_addr = #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_uri = #{requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exception = #{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_log set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remote_addr = #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_uri = #{requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception = #{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id as id,b.note as title,a.create_by as create_by,a.create_date as create_date, a.remote_addr as remote_addr,a.request_uri as request_uri,a.remarks as remarks,a.exception as exception from sys_log as a,tb_request_note as b where a.request_uri=b.request_url ORDER BY create_date DESC
